titleStmt.title: A nevv catalogue of the names of the knights for the counties, citizens and burgesses for the boroughs, and barons for the ports for the House of Commons, for this Parliament. Begunne at VVestminster the 3 of Novem. 1640. and continued to this time. VVerein the reader may take notice, that those who have deserted the Parliament since it began, their names are deciphered with this figure *: likewise those that are dead, with the letter, d.
titleStmt.author: Walkley, Thomas, d. 1658?

editionStmt.edition: The fifth impression corrected and much amended.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
